name: Doggy Box
description:
Jump from platform to platform and make it as far as you can, but you must hurry before the spike wall catches you! Collect bones along the way to unlock new characters.
Tap left for a small jump and tap right for a big jump.

Can you beat a score of 300?


Music: by NoCopyRightSounds

Different Heaven - Nekozilla [NCS Release]
